roleset.name: performance of a marriage (includes metaphorical usages)
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on wed-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls amalgamate-22.2-3-1-1.

example.name: both parties in arg1
example.text: They are all vying for the story of the millennium , which is , as if you did n't know , tomorrow 's wedding of singer Madonna and filmmaker Guy Ritchie .
example.arg: of singer Madonna and filmmaker Guy Ritchie

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Eros begged Zeus and Aphrodite for their consent to his wedding of Psyche.

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Because of the vividness and dramatic character of Hakuin's religious experiences, and his wedding of the twin Buddhist virtues of wisdom and compassion ...
example.arg: of the twin Buddhist virtues of wisdom and compassion
